About Me

Let me tell you a little bit about myself

Your project is in safe hands

Having a degree in Computer science, I hold strong fundamental knowledge about computers and programming. Been working in the IT industry since 2019 ,All the exposure and expertise from the industry, I managed to make full use of it. I dont do projects just for the sake of doing, I own the product once my hands lay on the keyboard. I write tech blogs in my free time, Staying up to date with latest and newest industry standards and practices, Updatin myself to stay relevant in this ever evolving field. I can communicate in Telugu,Hindi and English with full professional fluency. I train juniors and students for free whenever I get time, I believe Knowledge should be accessible to everyone.
